personal_info.bio: Software Engineer with over 13 years of experience building high-impact mobile, web, and backend applications. Expert in iOS (Swift/SwiftUI, SwiftData, strict concurrency), Flutter, C#/.NET, PHP, and Vue.js, with specialization in Fintech and Open Banking for Mexico and Latin America markets. I have led development teams, defined VIPER and Clean Architecture from scratch, and optimized products that scale in production for institutions like CITI and international remittance platforms. As a technology activist since 2012, I have driven the development ecosystem in Campeche through conferences, workshops, and university mentoring. Lead Organizer of GDG San Francisco de Campeche, I have organized events like DevFest and shared knowledge in over 100 conferences, being a recognized speaker at SG Virtual and collaborator in SEGIB Citizen Innovation Laboratories. I combine technical vision and community leadership to deliver quality software with real impact.
personal_info.short_bio: Software Engineer specialized in iOS, Flutter, .NET, PHP and Vue.js with 13+ years of experience. Expert in mobile architectures and tech leader in Fintech and Open Banking. GDG Lead Organizer, speaker and technology activist committed to the development ecosystem.
